name: Empathy Map by Human Deluxe
description:
An Empathy Map is a great way to get to know your audience. â€¨Imagine a sample audience member (or persona). What does their life look like?

Or better: What does their situation with your product or brand look like?


Use sticky notes to collectively add what your audience thinks & feels, sees & hears, says & does.


At Human Deluxe, we use Empathy Maps as part of brand building and Human Experience Design workshops. You can find this template and more information on https://toolbox.humandeluxe.com.


Human Deluxe is an international Design Studio based in Berlin, Germany. Founded in 2019, we regularly work with big clients like SAP and Zynga, but also startups and non-profits.
